snippet: Jeff Gordon raced to his third Nascar Sprint Cup victory of the year, holding off Kevin Harvick at the Pure Michigan 400 in Brooklyn, Mich., for his first win at Michigan International Speedway since 2001.
abstract: Nascar's Jeff Gordon wins Pure Michigan 400 auto race in Brooklyn, Mich; other racing news noted.
lead_paragraph: Jeff Gordon raced to his third Nascar Sprint Cup victory of the year, holding off Kevin Harvick at the Pure Michigan 400 in Brooklyn, Mich., for his first win at Michigan International Speedway since 2001.

headline.main: Gordon Wins Sprint Cup Race in Michigan
headline.print_headline: Gordon Wins Sprint Cup Race in Michigan
